span.span: Flatonia ISD follows the guidance and expertise of national and local health officials to help protect our students and staff from all communicable diseases. The district is aware that The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is monitoring an outbreak of respiratory illness (COVID-19) caused by a novel (new) coronavirus.Â Families are encouraged to visit theÂ CDC website for more information regardingÂ Coronavirus COVID-19.
